tone: Stardew Valley coziness × Duolingo addiction × Clash Royale cartoon boldness
core_fantasy: You are a superpowered Commander reclaiming corrupted planets through the power of learning.

design_pillars.name: ADHD-First
design_pillars.description: ~15-second micro-lessons + questions every 2-3 min. Instant feedback. Multi-sensory (TTS + visuals + animations + sounds).

design_pillars.name: Cozy & Addictive
design_pillars.description: Warm visuals, satisfying sounds, visible progress, rewarding loops. Never punishing.

design_pillars.name: Simple to Build
design_pillars.description: 2D/2.5D web app. Tile-based maps. CSS animations. No game engine required.

design_pillars.name: Autonomy
design_pillars.description: Recommended path, never forced. Player chooses what to study.

design_pillars.name: Spaced Repetition Disguised as Gameplay
design_pillars.description: Fog reclamation = forced review. Players never feel drilled.

setting.description: A solar system of seven vibrant planets, each home to unique indigenous creatures and ecosystems, blanketed in Grimble's corrupting fog.
setting.inciting_event: Grimble, wielding the Dark Crystal, has blanketed all seven planets in a corrupting fog that corrupts native creatures into mindless servants of darkness.
setting.player_origin: Your ship detects the disturbance. LYRA wakes you from cryo-sleep. A mysterious energy shimmer bonds to your nervous system, giving you Resonance.
setting.memory_fracture: The Dark Crystal's pulse caused a Memory Fracture in your mind. Your knowledge is scattered. As LYRA guides you, you rebuild your fractured memory piece by piece.

hub.name: Ship Dashboard
hub.description: A glass deck overlooking the 7 darkened planets. Your home base between missions.

opening_flow: Intro Cutscene: Illustrated panels + TTS narration (~60s) — planets consumed by fog, shimmer bonds to you, LYRA wakes you up.
Character Selection: Pick Commander (4 premade) + name + Resonance element.
Ship Dashboard: Glass deck overlooking 7 darkened planets. LYRA gives first mission briefing.
First Deploy: Tap recommended planet → first chapter → first guided lesson. Instant transition.

physics.kaplan_book: Kaplan MCAT Physics and Math Review

cars.kaplan_book: Kaplan MCAT Critical Analysis and Reasoning Skills Review

deployment_flow: Ship Dashboard → Tap Planet → Planet Map → Tap Sector → Tap Tile → MISSION START
transition_style: Clean fade transition with element-colored wash. Duolingo-speed. No travel animation.
